author: Shaurya Malwa
title: Ether, Dogecoin Surge Higher Than Bitcoin as DeFi Comments Spurs Bullish Mood
description: Ether outpaces bitcoin on fresh institutional inflows and rising demand for tokenization, signaling a potential push towards its all-time high.
content:
Shaurya is the Co-Leader of the CoinDesk tokens and data team in Asia with a focus on crypto derivatives, DeFi, market microstructure, and protocol analysis.
